original: Majjhima Nikāya 148
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Chachakkasutta
analyzed: chachakkasutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “bhikkhavo”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhavaḥ ti

original: “Bhadante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: bhadanta iti te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “dhammaṁ vo, bhikkhave, desessāmi ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ, kevalaparipuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ pakāsessāmi, yadidaṁ—
analyzed: dhammam vaḥ bhikkhave desessāmi ādi kalyāṇam majjhe kalyāṇam pariyosāna kalyāṇam sa attham sa byañjana kevala paripuṇṇam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakāsessāmi yat idam

original: cha chakkāni.
analyzed: cha chakkāni

original: Taṁ suṇātha, sādhukaṁ manasi karotha, bhāsissāmī”ti.
analyzed: tam suṇātha sādhukam manasi karotha bhāsissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bhante”ti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: eva bhante iti kho te bhikkhū bhagavato

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni veditabbāni, cha bāhirāni āyatanāni veditabbāni, cha viññāṇakāyā veditabbā, cha phassakāyā veditabbā, cha vedanākāyā veditabbā, cha taṇhākāyā veditabbā.
analyzed: cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni veditabbāni cha bāhirāni āyatanāni veditabbāni cha viññāṇa kāyā veditabbā cha phassa kāyā veditabbā cha vedanā kāyā veditabbā cha taṇhā kāyā veditabbā

original: ‘Cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni veditabbānī’ti—
analyzed: cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni veditabbāni iti

original: iti kho panetaṁ vuttaṁ. Kiñcetaṁ paṭicca vuttaṁ?
analyzed: iti kho pana itam vutta kiñca itam paṭicca vutta

original: Cakkhāyatanaṁ, sotāyatanaṁ, ghānāyatanaṁ, jivhāyatanaṁ, kāyāyatanaṁ, manāyatanaṁ.
analyzed: cakkhāyatana sotāyatana ghānāyatana jivhāyatana kāyāyatana manāyatana

original: ‘Cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni veditabbānī’ti—
analyzed: cha ajjhattikāni āyatanāni veditabbāni iti

analyzed: iti yam tam vutta idam etam paṭicca vutta

analyzed: idam paṭhamam chakka

analyzed: iti kho pana itam vutta kiñca itam paṭicca vutta

original: Rūpāyatanaṁ, saddāyatanaṁ, gandhāyatanaṁ, rasāyatanaṁ, phoṭṭhabbāyatanaṁ, dhammāyatanaṁ.
analyzed: rūpa āyatana sadda āyatana gandha āyatana rasa āyatana phoṭṭhabba āyatana dhamma āyatana

original: Manosamphassassa uppādopi vayopi paññāyati.

original: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
analyzed: yassa kho pana uppādaḥ api vayaḥ api paññāyati attā me uppajjati ca veti ca ati iccassa evamāgatam hoti

original: Tasmā taṁ na upapajjati:
analyzed: tasmāt tam na upapajjati

original: ‘manosamphasso attā’ti yo vadeyya.
analyzed: manaḥ samphassaḥ attā ati yaḥ vadeyya

original: Iti mano anattā, dhammā anattā, manoviññāṇaṁ anattā, manosamphasso anattā.
analyzed: iti manaḥ anattā dhammāḥ anattā manaḥ viññāṇam anattā manaḥ samphassaḥ anattā

original: ‘Vedanā attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
analyzed: vedanāḥ attā iti yaḥ vadeyya tam naḥ upapajjati

original: Vedanāya uppādopi vayopi paññāyati.
analyzed: vedanāya uppādaḥ api vayaḥ api paññāyati

original: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
analyzed: yassa kho pana uppādaḥ api vayaḥ api paññāyati attā me uppajjati ca veti ca ati iccassa evamāgatam hoti

original: Tasmā taṁ na upapajjati:
analyzed: tasmāt tam na upapajjati

original: ‘vedanā attā’ti yo vadeyya.
analyzed: vedanāḥ attā ati yaḥ vadeyya

original: Iti mano anattā, dhammā anattā, manoviññāṇaṁ anattā, manosamphasso anattā, vedanā anattā.
analyzed: iti manaḥ anattā dhammāḥ anattā manaḥ viññāṇam anattā manaḥ samphassaḥ anattā vedanā anattā

original: ‘Taṇhā attā’ti yo vadeyya taṁ na upapajjati.
analyzed: taṇhāḥ attā iti yaḥ vadeyya tam naḥ upapajjati

original: Taṇhāya uppādopi vayopi paññāyati.
analyzed: taṇhāyaḥ uppādaḥ api vayaḥ api paññāyati

original: Yassa kho pana uppādopi vayopi paññāyati, ‘attā me uppajjati ca veti cā’ti iccassa evamāgataṁ hoti.
analyzed: yassa kho pana uppādaḥ api vayaḥ api paññāyati attā me uppajjati ca veti ca ati iccassa evamāgatam hoti

original: Tasmā taṁ na upapajjati:
analyzed: tasmāt tam na upapajjati

original: ‘taṇhā attā’ti yo vadeyya.
analyzed: taṇhāḥ attā ati yaḥ vadeyya

original: Iti mano anattā, dhammā anattā, manoviññāṇaṁ anattā, manosamphasso anattā, vedanā anattā, taṇhā anattā.
analyzed: iti manaḥ anattā dhammāḥ anattā manaḥ viññāṇam anattā manaḥ samphassaḥ anattā vedanā anattā taṇhā anattā

original: Ayaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, sakkāyasamudayagāminī paṭipadā—
analyzed: ayam kho pana bhikkhave sa kāya samudaya gāminī paṭipadā

original: cakkhuṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati;
analyzed: cakkhum etam mama esaḥ aham asmi esaḥ me attā iti samanupassati

original: rūpe ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati;
analyzed: rūpe etam mama esaḥ aham asmi esaḥ me attā iti samanupassati

original: cakkhuviññāṇaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati;
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇam etam mama esaḥ aham asmi esaḥ me attā iti samanupassati

original: cakkhusamphassaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati;
analyzed: cakkhu samphassam etam mama esaḥ aham asmi esaḥ me attā iti samanupassati

original: vedanaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati;
analyzed: vedanam etam mama esaḥ aham asmi esaḥ me attā iti samanupassati

original: taṇhaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati;
analyzed: taṇham etam mama esaḥ aham asmi esaḥ me attā iti samanupassati

original: sotaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati …pe…
analyzed: etam mama esaḥ aham asmi esaḥ me attā iti samanupassati pe

original: ghānaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati …pe…
analyzed: ghānam etam mama esaḥ aham asmi esaḥ me attā iti samanupassati pe

original: jivhaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati …pe…
analyzed: jivham etam mama esaḥ aham asmi esaḥ me attā iti samanupassati pe

original: kāyaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati …pe…
analyzed: kāyam etam mama esaḥ aham asmi esaḥ me attā iti samanupassati pe

original: manaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati, dhamme ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi,
analyzed: manam etam mama esaḥ aham asmi esaḥ me attā iti samanupassati dhamme etam mama esaḥ aham asmi

original: eso me attā’ti samanupassati, manoviññāṇaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti
analyzed: esaḥ me attā iti samanupassati manaḥ viññāṇam etam mama esaḥ aham asmi esaḥ me attā iti

original: samanupassati, manosamphassaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati,
analyzed: samanupassati manaḥ samphassam etam mama esaḥ aham asmi esaḥ me attā iti samanupassati

original: vedanaṁ ‘etaṁ mama, esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati, taṇhaṁ ‘etaṁ mama,
analyzed: vedanam etam mama esaḥ aham asmi esaḥ me attā iti samanupassati taṇham etam mama

original: esohamasmi, eso me attā’ti samanupassati.
analyzed: esaḥ ham asmi esaḥ me attā iti samanupassati

original: Ayaṁ kho pana, bhikkhave, sakkāyanirodhagāminī paṭipadā—
analyzed: ayam kho pana bhikkhave sa kāya nirodha gāminī paṭipadā

original: cakkhuṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
analyzed: cakkhum na itam mama na isā aham asmi na mā isā attā ati samanupassati

original: Rūpe ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
analyzed: rūpe na itam mama na isā uham asmi na mā isā attā iti samanupassati

original: Cakkhuviññāṇaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
analyzed: cakkhu viññāṇam na itam mama na isā aham asmi na mā isā attā iti samanupassati

original: Cakkhusamphassaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
analyzed: cakkhu samphassam na itam mama na isī aham asmi na mā isī attā iti samanupassati

original: Vedanaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
analyzed: vedanam na itam mama na isā uham asmi na mā isā attā iti samanupassati

original: Taṇhaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
analyzed: taṇham na itam mama na isā uham asmi na mā isā attā iti samanupassati

original: Sotaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati …pe…
analyzed: sotam na itam mama na isā aham asmi na mā isā attā iti samanupassati pe

original: ghānaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati …pe…
analyzed: ghānam na itam mama na isā aham asmi na mā isā attā iti samanupassati pe

original: jivhaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati …pe…
analyzed: jivham na itam mama na isā uham asmi na mā isā attā ati samanupassati pe

original: kāyaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati …pe…
analyzed: kāyam na itam mama na isā aham asmi na mā isā attā iti samanupassati pe

original: manaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
analyzed: manam na itam mama na isā uham asmi na mā isā attā iti samanupassati

original: Dhamme ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
analyzed: dhamme na itam mama na isā ham asmi na mā iso attā ati samanupassati

original: Manoviññāṇaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
analyzed: manaḥ viññāṇam na itam mama na isā aham asmi na mā isā attā iti samanupassati

original: Manosamphassaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
analyzed: manaḥ samphassam na itam mama na isī aham asmi na mā isī attā iti samanupassati

original: Vedanaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
analyzed: vedanam na itam mama na isā uham asmi na mā isā attā iti samanupassati

original: Taṇhaṁ ‘netaṁ mama, nesohamasmi, na meso attā’ti samanupassati.
analyzed: taṇham na itam mama na isā uham asmi na mā isā attā iti samanupassati

original: Cakkhuñca, bhikkhave, paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhuviññāṇaṁ, tiṇṇaṁ saṅgati phasso, phassapaccayā uppajjati vedayitaṁ sukhaṁ vā dukkhaṁ vā adukkhamasukhaṁ vā.
analyzed: cakkhum ca bhikkhave paṭicca rūpe ca uppajjati cakkhu viññāṇa saṅgati phassaḥ phassa paccayā uppajjati vedayitam sukham vā dukkham vā adukkham asukham vā

original: So sukhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati.
analyzed: saḥ sukhāya vedanāya phuṭṭhaḥ samānaḥ abhinandati abhivadati ajjhosāya tiṭṭhati

original: Tassa rāgānusayo anuseti.
analyzed: tassa rāga anusayaḥ anuseti

original: Dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno socati kilamati paridevati urattāḷiṁ kandati sammohaṁ āpajjati.
analyzed: dukkhāya vedanāya phuṭṭhaḥ samānaḥ socati kilamati paridevati uras tāḷim kandati sammoham āpajjati

original: Tassa paṭighānusayo anuseti.
analyzed: tassa paṭigha anusayaḥ anuseti

original: Adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya phuṭṭho samāno tassā vedanāya samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtaṁ nappajānāti.
analyzed: adukkham asukhāya vedanāya phuṭṭhaḥ samāno tassāḥ vedanāya samudayañca atthaṅgamañca assādañca ādīnavañca nissaraṇañca yathābhūtam na pajānāti

original: Tassa avijjānusayo anuseti.
analyzed: tassa avijjā anusayaḥ anuseti

original: So vata, bhikkhave, sukhāya vedanāya rāgānusayaṁ appahāya dukkhāya vedanāya paṭighānusayaṁ
analyzed: saḥ vata bhikkhave sukhāya vedanāya rāga anusayam a pahāya dukkhāya vedanāya paṭigha anusaya

original: appaṭivinodetvā adukkhamasukhāya vedanāya avijjānusayaṁ asamūhanitvā avijjaṁ appahāya
analyzed: a paṭivinodetvā adukkham asukhāya vedanāya avijja anusayam a samūhanitvā avijjam appahāya

original: vijjaṁ anuppādetvā diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro bhavissatīti—netaṁ ṭhānaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: vijjam an uppādetvā diṭṭhe iva dhamme dukkhassa anta karaḥ bhavissati iti na etat ṭhānam vijjati

original: Sotañca, bhikkhave, paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati sotaviññāṇaṁ …pe…
analyzed: sotam ca bhikkhave paṭicca sadde ca uppajjati sota viññāṇam pe

original: vijjaṁ uppādetvā diṭṭheva dhamme dukkhassantakaro bhavissatīti—ṭhānametaṁ vijjati.
analyzed: vijjam uppādetvā diṭṭhe iva dhamme dukkhassa anta karaḥ bhavissati iti ṭhānam etat vijjati

original: Evaṁ passaṁ, bhikkhave, sutavā ariyasāvako cakkhusmiṁ nibbindati, rūpesu nibbindati, cakkhuviññāṇe nibbindati, cakkhusamphasse nibbindati, vedanāya nibbindati, taṇhāya nibbindati.
analyzed: evam passa bhikkhave sutavā ariya sāvako cakkhusmin nibbindati rūpesu nibbindati cakkhu viññāṇe nibbindati cakkhu samphasse nibbindati vedanāya nibbindati taṇhāya nibbindati

original: Sotasmiṁ nibbindati, saddesu nibbindati …pe…
analyzed: sotasmim nibbindati saddesu nibbindati pe

original: ghānasmiṁ nibbindati, gandhesu nibbindati …
analyzed: ghānasmim nibbindati gandhesu nibbindati

original: jivhāya nibbindati, rasesu nibbindati …
analyzed: jivhāya nibbindati rasesu nibbindati

original: kāyasmiṁ nibbindati, phoṭṭhabbesu nibbindati …
analyzed: kāyasmim nibbindati phoṭṭhabbesu nibbindati

original: manasmiṁ nibbindati, dhammesu nibbindati, manoviññāṇe nibbindati, manosamphasse nibbindati, vedanāya nibbindati, taṇhāya nibbindati.
analyzed: manasmin nibbindati dhammesu nibbindati manaḥ viññāṇe nibbindati manaḥ samphasse nibbindati vedanāya nibbindati taṇhāya nibbindati

original: Nibbindaṁ virajjati, virāgā vimuccati. Vimuttasmiṁ vimuttamiti ñāṇaṁ hoti.
analyzed: nibbindam virajjati virāgā vimuccati vimuttasmin vimuttam iti ñāṇam hoti

original: ‘Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā’ti pajānātī”ti.
analyzed: brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya ati pajānāti iti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Imasmiṁ kho pana veyyākaraṇasmiṁ bhaññamāne saṭṭhimattānaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ anupādāya āsavehi cittāni vimucciṁsūti.
analyzed: imasmin kho pana veyyākaraṇasmiṃ bhaññamāne saṭṭhimattānam bhikkhūnam an upādāya āsavehi cittāni

original: Chachakkasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ chaṭṭhaṁ.
analyzed: chachakka suttam niṭṭhitam chaṭṭha
